showcase_test.title: Athenaeum
showcase_test.description: Athenaeum is a rougelike deckbuilder where you venture through a mysterious library battling cultists and collecting cards. This was the original version of the game - it was remade to be fully released on Steam in 2025.

showcase_test.title: Bedtime Beats
showcase_test.description: You're a kid playing a rhythm game past your bedtime, try not to get caught!
showcase_test.credits: Art: Erin, Programming: Din & Jonathan, Audio: Bree & Breanna

showcase_test.title: Spellthief
showcase_test.description: A bullet hell game where you absorb mana from your enemies' spells to use against them!
showcase_test.credits: Nick Droppa, Chase Peterson, Trey Shneour, Nick Petrone, James Villareal

showcase_test.title: Don't Space Out
showcase_test.description: Fast-paced bullet hell shoot 'em up where you fly a spaceship while outrunning enemies at the same time solving puzzles to fix your malfunctioning ship.
showcase_test.credits: Annie Wong, Ethan Schwartzman, Breanna Lau, Jacky Mei, Zee Avila, Kevin Tang

showcase_test.title: Cloudburst
showcase_test.credits: Aslan Chan, Jonathan Renteria, Tiffany Phan, Jolina Leong

showcase_test.title: Sky Limit
showcase_test.description: This was originally a game jam game with 3 hours put into it, 4 more hours were put in with the help of design oriented to make the game substantially more fun.

showcase_test.title: Patrick's Parabox
showcase_test.description: Patrick's Parabox is an award-winning puzzle game about playing with recursion and infinities by pushing boxes into and out of each other.

showcase_test.title: Tethered Spirit
showcase_test.description: Tethered Spirit is a fantasy escape room puzzle game made for the UCSD TritonWare Game Jam 2024.
showcase_test.credits: Caylin Canoy, Eugene Lee, Nick Mitroff, Grace Ortiz, Ethan Schwartzman, Nathan Scott, Tamika Hsieh

showcase_test.title: Clovenward
showcase_test.description: Stealth-based single player game focused on evading vampires and escaping a warehouse!
showcase_test.credits: Owen Atis, Aldrin Llagan, Alexia Doan, Minothory, Maia Macahilig

showcase_test.title: Ground Control
showcase_test.description: You're the ground staff for the latest space mission, but there are unknown forces causing technical issues! Solve puzzles to help your astronauts come home safely
showcase_test.credits: Olivia Tsui, Allison Kim, Aayush Motiani, Ilia Aballa, Katie Hanako, Arihant Jain, Chris Kreins

showcase_test.title: Overtime
showcase_test.description: Get rid of the viruses to avoid overtime
showcase_test.credits: Maya Adenihun, Isabela Sanjume, Yoomee Ho, Bowen (Bee) Bothello, Neo, George Minasyan
